Politics Follow Racial Boundaries

A racial boundary splits Texas in two.

The only exceptions are metropolises like Dallas and Houston.

Majority white

Minority coalition

Hispanic / Latino

Sources: FiveThirtyEight, Ryne Rohla/Decision Desk HQ, U.S. Census Bureau, Brian Olson
